name: OpenSea NFT Collection Branding Template
description:
A simple Figma template to help you plan out the branding for your upcoming NFT collection on OpenSea.


You can customize the collection name, twitter handle, PFP and header banner â€” with previews in both light and dark mode.


If you're interested in templates for other NFT marketplaces let me know in the comments and I'll continue to add new sites to this file.


Hope this saves you some time!


WAGMI


devin.eth
